product.name: Dayring
product.slogan: Visualize a guilt-free and grounded day

requirements.description: Application launches minimized to system tray on system startup
steps: Configure app to run on system startup
Restart the system or simulate startup
Verify app icon appears in system tray
Verify no application windows are visible on screen

requirements.description: Application runs persistently in background until explicitly exited
steps: Verify app icon remains in system tray
Perform other tasks on the computer for several minutes
Verify app continues running (icon still present in tray)
Right-click tray icon and select exit option
Verify app closes and icon disappears from tray

requirements.description: Step 0 displays welcome screen with app name and Continue button only
steps: Launch app for first time (or reset onboarding state)
Verify welcome screen displays 'Welcome to Dayring'
Verify text is centered on screen
Verify only a 'Continue →' button is present
Verify no 'Back' button is present on this step

requirements.description: Step 0 Continue button advances to Step 1
steps: Verify Step 1 (Wake Time) screen is displayed

requirements.description: Step 1 displays wake time prompt with scrollable time selectors
steps: Verify prompt text: 'A consistent sleep schedule maximizes your productivity. When will you wake up every day?'
Verify hour selector is present and scrollable (up/down)
Verify minute selector is present and scrollable (up/down)
Verify AM/PM selector is present and scrollable (up/down)

requirements.description: Step 1 hour selector allows scrolling through valid hour values
steps: Verify hour increments (1-12 range for 12-hour format)
Verify selector wraps appropriately at boundaries

requirements.description: Step 1 minute selector allows scrolling through valid minute values
steps: Verify selector wraps appropriately at boundaries

requirements.description: Step 1 AM/PM selector toggles between AM and PM
Step 1 displays Back and Continue buttons
Step 1 Back button returns to Step 0
Step 1 Continue button advances to Step 2 and preserves wake time selection
steps: Verify Step 2 (Sleep Time) screen is displayed
Verify wake time still shows 7:30 AM

requirements.description: Step 2 displays sleep time prompt with scrollable time selectors
steps: Verify prompt text: 'When do you sleep?'
Verify hour selector is present and scrollable
Verify minute selector is present and scrollable
Verify AM/PM selector is present and scrollable

requirements.description: Step 2 displays Back and Continue buttons
Step 2 Back button returns to Step 1
steps: Verify Step 1 (Wake Time) screen is displayed

requirements.description: Step 2 Continue button advances to Step 3
steps: Verify Step 3 (Time Awareness) screen is displayed

requirements.description: Step 3 displays calculated waking hours based on wake and sleep times
steps: Set wake time to 7:00 AM in Step 1
Set sleep time to 11:00 PM in Step 2
Verify prompt displays: 'You are awake 16 hours and 0 minutes every day. Where did all these hours go?'

requirements.description: Step 3 correctly calculates waking hours with minutes
steps: Set wake time to 6:30 AM in Step 1
Set sleep time to 10:15 PM in Step 2
Verify prompt displays: 'You are awake 15 hours and 45 minutes every day. Where did all these hours go?'

requirements.description: Step 3 displays Back and Continue buttons
Step 3 Back button returns to Step 2
steps: Verify Step 2 (Sleep Time) screen is displayed

requirements.description: Step 3 Continue button advances to Step 4
steps: Verify Step 4 (Buy Me a Coffee) screen is displayed

requirements.description: Step 4 displays support message and donation options
steps: Verify text displays: 'Support Kojjyan, the developer of this productivity tool.'

requirements.description: Step 4 Continue button opens Buy Me a Coffee page in default browser
steps: Verify Buy Me a Coffee page loads

requirements.description: Step 4 Skip button proceeds to Configure window
Step 4 Back button returns to Step 3
steps: Verify Step 3 (Time Awareness) screen is displayed

requirements.description: Step 4 (Buy Me a Coffee) does not appear on app startup after initial onboarding
steps: Verify Step 4 screen does not appear
Verify annulus appears directly (or app minimizes to tray)

requirements.description: Step 4 (Buy Me a Coffee) appears every time Configure is opened from system tray
steps: Verify Step 4 (Buy Me a Coffee) screen appears before Configure window

requirements.description: Annulus fades into view after onboarding completes
steps: Complete onboarding flow (reach Configure window via Skip)
Verify annulus (ring shape) appears on screen
Verify annulus has a smooth fade-in animation (not instant appearance)

requirements.description: Annulus displays with visible border
steps: Verify annulus has a visible border around the ring

requirements.description: Annulus default position is top-right corner of screen
steps: Verify annulus appears in top-right corner of the screen
Verify annulus does not clip off-screen

requirements.description: Annulus represents only waking hours (not full 24 hours)
steps: Set sleep time to 10:00 PM (14 waking hours)
Verify the full ring represents the 14 waking hours
Verify the annulus is NOT divided into 24 segments

requirements.description: Top of annulus represents both wake time and sleep time
steps: Verify the visual top of the annulus is the starting point (wake time)
Verify the visual top is also the ending point (sleep time)
Verify the cycle completes at the same point

requirements.description: Radial line indicates current system time position on annulus
steps: Set wake time to 6:00 AM, sleep time to 10:00 PM
At 2:00 PM (8 hours after wake, 50% of day elapsed)
Verify a radial line intersects the annulus perpendicularly
Verify line position corresponds to approximately 50% around the ring from the top

requirements.description: Radial time indicator updates as system time progresses
steps: Observe the radial line position on annulus
Verify the radial line has moved clockwise slightly
Alternatively, change system time forward by 1 hour
Verify radial line position updates correspondingly

requirements.description: Elapsed time portion of annulus is greyed out
steps: Verify the portion from wake time (top) to current time is greyed out
Verify the remaining portion (current time to sleep time) retains its color

requirements.description: App icon persists in system tray while running
steps: Verify app icon appears in system tray
Verify icon remains visible in system tray throughout

requirements.description: Right-click on tray icon displays context menu with Enable/Disable toggle
steps: Right-click on app icon in system tray
Verify 'Enable' or 'Disable' option is present (toggle state)

requirements.description: Right-click menu Enable/Disable toggle controls annulus visibility
steps: With annulus visible, right-click tray icon

requirements.description: Right-click menu contains Configure Your Day option
steps: Right-click on app icon in system tray
Verify 'Configure Your Day' option is present in menu

requirements.description: Configure Your Day menu option opens Buy Me a Coffee screen then Configure window
steps: Right-click on app icon in system tray
Verify Buy Me a Coffee screen (Step 4) appears

requirements.description: Double left-click on tray icon opens Configure flow

Verify Buy Me a Coffee screen (Step 4) appears

requirements.description: Configure window displays app logo and/or app name in header

Verify slider is adjustable across full range

requirements.description: Annulus opacity increases when cursor is near it (hover behavior)
steps: Set annulus opacity to 60% in Configure window

steps: Set annulus opacity to 90% in Configure window

requirements.description: Task labels fade in when cursor is near annulus
steps: Create at least one task with a name
Verify task labels are not visible on annulus
Verify task labels fade in next to their corresponding segments

requirements.description: Configure window contains annulus size adjustment control
steps: Verify annulus size adjustment control is present
Verify it allows increasing and decreasing the annulus diameter

requirements.description: Annulus size adjustment changes diameter in real-time
steps: Open Configure window with annulus visible

requirements.description: Annulus grows inward when size increases (never clips off-screen)
steps: Note the outer edge position of annulus
Verify the outer edge remains in same position
Verify annulus grows inward (inner radius decreases)
Verify annulus does not extend off-screen

requirements.description: Annulus center displays remaining hours in large text
steps: Set wake time to 8:00 AM, sleep time to 10:00 PM (14 hours)

requirements.description: Annulus center displays 'remaining' subtitle below hours
steps: Verify small subtitle text below the hours displays 'remaining'

requirements.description: Remaining hours updates as time passes
steps: Wait until the hour changes (or adjust system time)
Verify remaining hours count decreases appropriately

requirements.description: Task list displays task entries with name, start time, end time, and color square
steps: Verify each task entry shows: task name field, start time field, end time field, color square

requirements.description: Task entry color square opens color picker when clicked

Verify color square updates to selected color

requirements.description: Task entry includes soft edges checkbox
steps: Verify soft edges checkbox is present for the task

requirements.description: Soft edges checkbox enables blending on annulus segment
steps: View annulus - verify task segment has hard/sharp edges
View annulus - verify task segment has soft/blended edges

requirements.description: Task delete button appears only on hover
steps: View a task entry without hovering
Verify delete button is not visible
Hover cursor over the task entry

requirements.description: Task delete button removes task from list
steps: Open Configure window with existing tasks
Hover over a task and click delete button
Verify task is removed from the list
Verify task count decreases by one

requirements.description: Default tasks are pre-populated: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner
steps: Perform fresh installation or reset to defaults
Verify 'Breakfast' task exists with time 8:30 AM – 9:00 AM
Verify 'Lunch' task exists with time 12:00 PM – 12:30 PM
Verify 'Dinner' task exists with time 6:00 PM – 6:30 PM

requirements.description: Default tasks are editable
steps: Edit the 'Breakfast' task name to 'Morning Meal'
Edit the start time to 8:00 AM

requirements.description: Plus button adds a new task entry
steps: Verify a new empty task entry is added to the list

requirements.description: Pressing Enter after entering task times saves the task
steps: Verify task is saved (not in edit mode)

requirements.description: Task list automatically reshuffles into chronological order after save
steps: Add task 'Early Task' from 7:00 AM – 7:30 AM
Verify task list is in chronological order

requirements.description: Task outside waking hours shows red triangle warning icon
steps: Set wake time to 8:00 AM, sleep time to 10:00 PM
Create task from 6:00 AM – 7:00 AM (before wake time)
Verify small red triangle with exclamation appears to the left of task name

requirements.description: Task outside waking hours does not appear on annulus
steps: Set wake time to 8:00 AM, sleep time to 10:00 PM
Create task from 11:00 PM – 11:30 PM (after sleep time)
Verify this task segment does not appear on annulus

requirements.description: Overlapping tasks show orange circle warning icon
steps: Create task 'Task A' from 2:00 PM – 3:00 PM
Create task 'Task B' from 2:30 PM – 3:30 PM (overlaps with Task A)
Verify small orange circle with exclamation appears to the left of both task names

requirements.description: Validation icons appear to the left of task name without shifting alignment
steps: Note the position of the task name
Modify task to trigger a warning
Verify warning icon appears to the left
Verify task name position has not shifted

requirements.description: Both warning icons can appear simultaneously and stack horizontally
steps: Set wake time to 8:00 AM, sleep time to 10:00 PM
Create task 'Task A' from 9:00 AM – 10:00 AM
Create task 'Task B' from 6:00 AM – 9:30 AM (outside hours AND overlapping)
Verify Task B shows both red triangle and orange circle icons
Verify icons are stacked horizontally to the left of task name

requirements.description: Hovering validation icon shows descriptive tooltip
steps: Create a task that triggers the red triangle warning
Hover cursor over the red triangle icon
Verify a tooltip/speech-bubble appears with description (e.g., 'Task is outside waking hours')
Create a task that triggers the orange circle warning
Hover cursor over the orange circle icon
Verify a tooltip appears with description (e.g., 'Task overlaps with another task')

requirements.description: Application runs on Windows
Application runs on macOS
steps: Verify menu bar/system tray integration works

requirements.description: Application runs on Linux

steps: Verify no menu bar is visible at the top of the window
Verify File, Edit, View, Window, Help options are not present

requirements.description: Rotation input allows direct keyboard entry of degree values

requirements.description: Annulus displays a small gap between wake time and sleep time points
steps: Complete onboarding with wake time 7:00 AM and sleep time 11:00 PM
Verify there is a visible small gap at the top of the annulus
Verify the gap separates the wake time start point from the sleep time end point
Verify the annulus is not a complete closed ring

requirements.description: Annulus fades in from wake time point when wake fade-in is enabled
steps: Ensure wake time fade-in checkbox is checked
Verify the annulus segment starting at wake time (after the gap) fades in gradually
Verify the fade creates a smooth gradient from transparent to full opacity
Verify the fade-in effect is visually apparent at the wake time starting edge

requirements.description: Annulus fades out toward sleep time point when sleep fade-out is enabled
steps: Ensure sleep time fade-out checkbox is checked
Verify the annulus segment approaching sleep time fades out gradually
Verify the fade creates a smooth gradient from full opacity to transparent
Verify the fade-out effect ends at the sleep time edge (before the gap)

requirements.description: Annulus shows no fade-in effect when wake fade-in is disabled
steps: Verify the annulus begins at full opacity immediately after the gap
Verify there is no gradient fade effect at the wake time edge

requirements.description: Annulus shows no fade-out effect when sleep fade-out is disabled
steps: Verify the annulus maintains full opacity up to the sleep time edge
Verify there is no gradient fade effect approaching the gap

requirements.description: Color palette selection updates unallocated time, passed time, and all task colors
steps: Note current colors for unallocated time, passed time, and tasks
Select a different color palette from the dropdown
Verify unallocated time color box updates to new palette color
Verify passed time color box updates to new palette color
Verify all task color squares update to new palette colors
View annulus and confirm all segments reflect the new palette

requirements.description: Color palette UI clearly indicates it affects all color settings
steps: Verify there is a label or description indicating the palette affects unallocated time, passed time, and task colors
Verify the relationship between palette selection and individual color boxes is visually clear
Verify selecting a palette visibly updates all related color boxes simultaneously

requirements.description: Unallocated time color is controlled by palette (not hardcoded blue)
steps: Perform fresh installation or reset to defaults
Verify unallocated time color matches the default palette (not always blue)
Select a palette with a non-blue unallocated time color
Verify unallocated time segments display the palette color, not blue

requirements.description: Soft edge blending between tasks and unallocated time is gradual and visually smooth
steps: Create a task with soft edges checkbox enabled
Verify the transition between task segment and adjacent unallocated time is a gradual gradient
Verify the blend spans a visually appropriate distance (not too abrupt)
Verify the gradient appears smooth without harsh color banding
Verify the blend looks polished and professional

requirements.description: Soft edge blending between adjacent tasks is gradual and visually smooth
steps: Create two adjacent tasks (Task A ends when Task B begins)
Enable soft edges for both tasks
Verify the transition between the two task segments is a gradual gradient
Verify colors blend smoothly without harsh edges
Verify the effect appears sleek and intentional

requirements.description: Radial time indicator line aligns exactly with the passed time edge
steps: Observe the radial line indicating current time
Observe the edge where passed time (greyed) meets remaining time
Verify the radial line is positioned exactly at this edge
Verify there is no gap between the line and the passed time boundary
Verify there is no overlap where the line extends into remaining time
Change system time and verify alignment remains accurate

requirements.description: Radial time indicator updates position in sync with passed time coloring
steps: Observe annulus as time progresses (or adjust system clock incrementally)
Verify the radial line and the passed time edge move together
Verify at no point does the line lag behind or advance ahead of the passed time fill
Verify both update at the same rate
